about_the_game:
Fengshen Zhuan "is a strategy chess game set against the backdrop of ancient Chinese mythology and legends. The game features Jiang Ziya as the protagonist, and players will play the role of this legendary strategist who combines wisdom and courage, leading his divine soldiers and generals to conquer all directions and ultimately achieve the great cause of becoming a god.

Fengshen Zhuan - The Perfect Fusion of Strategy and Myth

In the game "Fengshen Zhuan: Battle Chess", you will travel through time and space to return to the era where mythology and reality intertwined. Jiang Ziya, this legendary sage, will lead you into a world full of mystery and challenges.

Strategy first, wisdom takes over the world. In the game, you need to use Jiang Ziya's wisdom, carefully plan and strategize. Every decision can change the course of the battle, and every battle tests your strategy and wisdom.

With the help of divine generals, each displaying their divine powers to summon numerous mythical generals such as Nezha, Yang Jian, Lei Zhenzi, etc., they each possess unique skills and combat styles. Reasonable combination and unleashing their maximum potential are the key to your victory.

Chess battles are played step by step using classic chess gameplay. Players need to carefully layout on the chessboard, utilize the characteristics of terrain and generals, and engage in strategic battles. Every movement needs to be cautious, and every attack needs to be precise.

Mythical plot, immersive experience game with rich plot, taking you to deeply understand the story of Fengshen Yanyi. As the game progresses, you will uncover the secrets behind each mythological story and experience epic battles.

short_description: 游戏以周朝开国丞相姜子牙的视角展开。从他受师命下山辅助明君开始，一路作战，最终推翻残暴的商王朝，完成封神大任。
